user_query: I want to organize a team-building event for my company on September 1st. Can you help me analyze this day's working hours, considering the Federal holidays in the United States? Additionally, fetch the details of the event with ID 1 and send me the calendar invite.

TaskList.description: Analyze the working hours for September 1st, considering Federal holidays in the United States.
Fetch the details of the event with ID 1.
Send a calendar invite for the team-building event to the employees.
